title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 59.4 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 59.4 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall not apply to any bicycle
not equipped with a brake and which therefore cannot be operated on a public
highway provided a sticker or tag is affixed to such bicycle indicating that
such bicycle cannot legally be operated on the public
highway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
59.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
